channel.title: Getting Started on nomado API | Send sms | Place call | OTP | 2FA
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on nomado API | Send sms | Place call | OTP | 2FA

item.title: Base URL
item.description: nomado REST API is served with the following URL: https://api.nomado.eu Use of SDK libraries are highly recommended so that you wont face any breaking changes in the future. nomado REST API is served over HTTPS only to ensure data privacy, GDPR, PSD2, PCI and other compliances.

item.title: Authentication
item.description: All nomado REST API endpoints are protected with three authentication methods : User credentials, JSON Web Tokens and API Keys. We recommend to use JSON Web Tokens and API Keys. User credentials User credential based authentication is the easiest of all to test and explore nomado REST API. User credentials should be provided with each request in Authorization header base64 encoded and separated by :. Example: If your username is myemail@myserver.
